topics.title: What is WorldWeaver
topics.string:
WorldWeaver (WW) is an Interactive Fiction (IF) engine built in C# and ported to multiple platforms.
What sets WW apart from other IF engines is:

1. Its flexibility (_help configuration)
2. It is designed to build games as opposed to stories (_help games vs stories)
3. Defining games is flexible and concise (_help nrmn)
4. You create your own syntax and actions (_help syntax)
